channel.title: [508] Compiling Error [508]
channel.description:
Im trying to compile everything using all.bat. Here is the error message
The system cannot find the path specified. javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\players\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\players\update\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\players\items\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\players\combat\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\io\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\io\packets\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\net\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\util\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\world\mapdata\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\world\items\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
Inside the all.bat file
@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/world/items/*.java pause
Please help instead of looking at it..

item.title: [508] Compiling Error [508]
item.dc:creator: @tarheels tarheels
item.description:
@tarheels wrote:

Im trying to compile everything using all.bat. Here is the error message

The system cannot find the path specified.
javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\players*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\players\update*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\players\items*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\players\combat*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\io*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\io\packets*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\net*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\util*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\world\mapdata*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\world\items*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

Inside the all.bat file

@echo off
cd …/src
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./bulby/rs2/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/update/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/items/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/combat/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./bulby/rs2/io/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./bulby/rs2/io/packets/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./bulby/rs2/net/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./bulby/rs2/util/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./bulby/rs2/world/mapdata/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./bulby/rs2/world/items/*.java
pause

Please help instead of looking at it…
